Title: Skyfire Cycle
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), David Phillips, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Terry meets his lifelong hero, a famous author who's received death threats. In other events, Gina tries to choose the location of the Boyle family vacation and Amy sides with Kevin in his argument with Holt over a math puzzle.
